thread.title: The Art of Tying a Scarf
thread.title_full: The Art of Tying a Scarf - WSJ

author: Ray A. Smith
title: The Art of Tying a Scarf
text:
Can Americans finally get good at tying scarves?
French women do it with panache. Italians wear theirs with sprezzatura. But American men and women have long had an inferiority complex. We tend to see the ability to drape, twist, wrap and tie that perfect scarf knot as something passed down as a family secret or as a genetic gift, something weâ€™ll never do as well.
